changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base_table.id, p.name AS parent, sc.name AS status_code, base_table.sequence_number, nc.name AS next_child, ncs.name AS next_child_status, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM product_child_sequencing_authorization base_table JOIN product p ON base_table.parent = p.id JOIN status_code sc ON base_table.status_code = sc.id LEFT JOIN product nc ON base_table.next_child = nc.id LEFT JOIN status_code ncs ON base_table.next_child_status = ncs.id JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
